    • Method Detail

      • setGVRDelegate

        public static void setGVRDelegate(GeckoVRManager.GVRDelegate delegate)
        Set the GVR Delegate for GeckoView.
        Parameters:
        delegate - GVRDelegate instance or null to unset.

      • setGVRPaused

        public static void setGVRPaused(boolean aPaused)
        Set the GVR paused state.
        Parameters:
        aPaused - True if the application is being paused, False if the application is resuming.

      • setGVRPresentingContext

        public static void setGVRPresentingContext(long aContext)
        Set the GVR presenting context.
        Parameters:
        aContext - GVR context to use when WebVR starts to present. Pass in zero to stop presenting.

      • cleanupGVRNonPresentingContext

        public static void cleanupGVRNonPresentingContext()
        Inform WebVR that the non-presenting context needs to be destroyed.
